item.description:
Come spread the Message of Dr Paul at the Hillsborough Balloon Festival. There should be a ton of people there. Bring signs, and wear Ron Paul shirts. Frank from CT will launch a balloon and is willing to put Ron Paul signs on it. But we have lost contact with him, so see if you can find him. My suggested meeting point is close to the bathrooms at the launch area.

Starts at 6am with a launch, but show up when you can. Check the balloon festival web site for a detailed schedule.
item.name: Hillsborough Balloon Festival
